GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an array of all articles by its id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments by an article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of a new comment by an article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of an updated article by its id with an incremented vote
